title: Cant connect to chat
body: So my friend got chat banned for 14 days and I was laughing at him but when I logged on I found that I couldnt connect to chat?? I can queue up for everything but I cant connect to the quests or messages, Is this because we I used his email to sign up?

replies.body:
It's not very well known, but the chat system is actually held on a different server which requires it's own connection. Your network might be getting blocked from the chat servers for a couple different reasons so let's try a few things. 

First update your [**DNS settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq5), then if that doesn't work make sure you update your [**firewall exceptions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) as well. Be sure to let me know if this isn't helping!
